sentences.en: Evans had rheumatic fever, missed school and fell behind.
sentences.cn: 伊万斯得了风湿热，没去上课，功课也落下了。

sentences.en: He spent three months in the hospital with acute rheumatic arthritis.
sentences.cn: 他患急性风湿性关节炎,在医院住了三个月.

sentences.en: Immuno biological therapy is the major trend for treatment of rheumatic diseases.
sentences.cn: 免疫及生物治疗是风湿病临床和研究领域的主要方向之一.

sentences.en: It gives rapid relief from rheumatic aches and pains.
sentences.cn: 它能迅速缓解风湿疼痛。

sentences.en: Note also the thickened, shortened and fused chordae tendineae that represent remote rheumatic heart disease.
sentences.cn: 注意腱索变厚 、 缩短、粘连,这是风湿性心脏病的表现.

sentences.en: Object : The distribute condition of ENA Anti - body of patient with rheumatic disease.
sentences.cn: 了解风湿性疾病患者ENA多肽抗体分布情况.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To observe the therapeutic effect of YunKe, a new drug, on rheumatic arthritis ( RA ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察新药云克治疗 类风湿 性关节炎的临床疗效.

sentences.en: One of the feared complications of the rheumatic diseases is renal failure.
sentences.cn: 风湿病较为严重的并发症之一是肾衰.

sentences.en: Other studies have shown that people with rheumatic diseases often have low levels of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 其他研究也表明患有风湿性疾病的患者通常维生素水平较低.

sentences.en: Quantitative Pathological Study of Right Atrium Myocardium in Patients with Sustained Atrial Fibrillation and Rheumatic Disease.
sentences.cn: 与风心病持续性心房颤动患者右房肌病理定量研究>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: Rheumatic arthritis, diabetes, have blood pressure, liver function lacks proper care.
sentences.cn: 风湿性关节炎, 糖尿病, 高血压, 肝功能失调.

sentences.en: She had been up the whole night with rheumatic aches.
Sjogren's syndrome is sometimes linked to rheumatic problems such as rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.cn: 干燥综合征有时与风湿性疾病有关,例如类风湿关节炎.

sentences.en: This article introduces professor Sun Jianzhi s clinical experience in treating rheumatic heart disease.
sentences.cn: 总结孙建芝教授诊治风湿性心脏病经验.

sentences.en: This is chronic rheumatic valvulitis involving the mitral valve.
sentences.cn: 慢性风湿性心瓣膜病(二尖瓣狭窄).
